Cloud word segmentation \n Combine common word words together, enabled by default
Local word segmentation \n splits each word apart, without the network

When both the notification and suspension windows are closed, a pop-up window is temporarily displayed when Bigbang is triggered, and Bigbang is activated by clicking the floating window

We are sorry, since OCR is a paid service, and because there is no access to advertising, authors have assumed the cost of 3,000 yuan per month, now can not afford this cost. Your experience on the course could be compromised. \n You can click "How to use it for free" for more information.
How to use it for free
Our OCR times has nearly exhausted, you want a better experience, please go to Settings for the "How to Get Free OCR"
In the next few steps, you can use the free OCR feature 5000 times per month. \nYou can also donate 10 yuan to the author, and postscript need KEY, by the author to help you apply.
Step 1: Use your browser to open the URL: https://www.microsoft.com/cognitive-services/ \n(Click to Copy URL)
Step 2: Click "My account" in the upper right corner of the page, as shown below.
Step 3: Select a suitable way to register / log on the site, the following account to log on Microsoft as an example.
Step 4: If you do not have Microsoft accounts, you need to use the mailbox to register Microsoft accounts. And then authorize the use of Microsoft account to log on to this website, as shown below.
Step 5: After login, click the button in the red box below to send the verification message.

Step 6: to the mailbox to find the verification message, click through the verification. (If you can not receive the verification message, you can repeatedly refresh the fifth step in the page, re-mail)
Step 7: After the mail authentication is successful, it will automatically jump to the following page, click the red box button.
Step 8: In the product list check the following figure shows the function, probably in the fourth row position.
Step 9: Check the "Agree Agreement", then click on the submission, as shown below.
Step 10: Copy your KEY, as shown below, and fill in the final input to the page box, and confirm.

Step 11: Use OCR to verify whether the success, if a 401 error, it may be filled in the KEY contains spaces, or the eighth step is not correct. If not, it may be Microsoft server needs to be synchronized, you can wait for some time to try again.
The name or URL can not be empty
Address (last search will be stitched on the word)
Left slide to edit or delete, long press to adjust position
You can set, add the default search engine used by the built-in browser
Auto add blanks after English words\n(Spaces are treated as normal symbols by default, and are not added when unchecked)
Keep Header Button At The Top
After the process is killed or restart the phone, you need to re-open the accessibility service
This will restore all settings to their defaults, but the OCR key will remain. Confirm recovery?
If the backup file is modified, may lead to some exceptions, confirm the recovery?
Normal backup does not back up the OCR key.\nThe backup OCR will only backup the OCR key,backup can only be restored on this machine.
The configuration item saved to sdcard/quannengfenci/backup
After setting, please try to press the Home button to call out the menu, if not, the function is invalid on your phone,so turn it off.
Set the keys to open the menu
Need to open the accessibility services and window permissions, in some phones may be conflict with the system function.
If the Home key does not work, "Set up a helper application"
Show sidebar(not visible in non-fullscreen mode)
How to set up and use (please see the above description first)
How to set up and use

After reading the introduction, you should be on the application of the application scenarios and deficiencies have some understanding. 
				 Because we do not have system privileges, so only through other means to provide you with a more convenient word segmentation experience, shortcomings, please understand. 
				 In addition to the suggested usage recommendations, we have the following suggestions: 
				 1. In the WeChat, QQ and other chat applications, the use of click to trigger the trigger is more convenient, as is the click, double-click or long press, it is their advantages and disadvantages, by your own judgment. 
				 2. In the browsing application, the use of replication trigger segmentation, for some browsers may have to exit the interface to trigger word segmentation, multi-step operation, it is still very convenient. 
				 3. The ability to use global replication where global replication, than the system to facilitate replication, but where can we have to try your own, and we can not count all applications. 
				 4. In other functions are not useful when the screenshot OCR as a last weapon, but also can play a lot of role, but if the text is not clear and complete, the recognition rate may need to be improved. 
				 5. You can also open the "click the ball trigger Bigbang" to reduce false triggering. 
				 

				 Of course, you will have their own experience in the use of the process, we provide the greatest space, You can customize your own features and segmentation interface. If there are other custom needs, you can contact us, for good advice, we have never been good!
Why use a floating window or a notification bar

\t\t\t\tThe function of this application is relatively complex, requires the user to have some hands-on exploration capabilities. Suspended window, notification bar and long key menu, on the one hand can provide monitoring function of the switch to prevent false triggering, on the other hand is the global copy and screenshot OCR function entrance. It is recommended that you choose the most comfortable way to use. \n\t\t\t\t If you do not like, do not need to use global replication and screenshots OCR, you can also choose to open the "Click the ball trigger Bigbang", so that when monitoring clicks and replication, and will not trigger the wrong word, affecting the user experience. \n\t\t\t\t PS: In some mobile phones, open the suspension window will result in the application to apply for permission to fail, you can install a new application to close the suspension window, you can also use the notification bar instead.

The application can trigger a click by monitoring the click, but the permissions need to be granted to the secondary mode, but the secondary schema privilege may be reclaimed by the system after the process is cleaned up, so add this application to the autostart white. List and clean up the white list.
Why sometimes clicking a trigger participle does not work

because we are monitoring the user's click to determine whether to trigger the word segmentation, this part of the function is achieved through the auxiliary service. A click can not be detected when: 
				 1. Some applications do not support ancillary services on the click of the capture, after the occurrence of clicks, no notice to the ancillary services, such as WeChat circle of friends. 
				 2. Some applications shielding some of the click events, such as setting some location is not clickable, such as the system settings page can not use long press trigger segmentation. 
				 3. Some seem to be the text of the place, in fact, use the picture to draw, such as some readers: iReader and so on. 
				 And sometimes some applications will abuse the click event, such as NetEase cloud music comment interface, will slip mistaken for long press. 
				 If this happens, you can try to use a copy trigger, global copy, or screenshot OCR to trigger the word segmentation.
Why some browsers do not trigger word segmentation in replication

\t\t\t\t In some browsers (such as WeChat comes with a browser, QQ browser, UC browser, etc.), copy text can not trigger the word segmentation. \n\t\t\t\t This is because these browsers take over the system\'s copy function, the user clicks the copy, to exit the browser page when it is really set to the system\'s clipboard, so we will be able to receive notification, and then only Trigger segmentation. \n\t\t\t\t The solution is, in these browsers, the copy is complete, the temporary exit the browser page (Home key back to the desktop, or enter the multi-tasking interface, or press the Back key to completely exit), you can trigger the word break. Or use our provided screenshots OCR recognition, global replication (only in the Chrome kernel browser to be useful).

\t\t\t\t We are using Microsoft\'s services, high fees, because we do not generate revenue this application, so unbearable, but you can follow the application in the boot to apply their own key,There are 5,000 free credit each month , I believe enough to meet your needs. Of course, you can give us more than 10 yuan donated by us to provide you with key.
Why universal copy does not work in some pages

\t\t\t\t The principle of global replication is through the auxiliary service to crawl the current page of text information, and this information is required to be applied to the replication service, the following circumstances may lead to global replication can not catch Text: \n\t\t\t\t 1. If the application does not provide text information to the auxiliary service, you can not fetch the text, such as browser (Chrome browser exception) and QQ message interface, etc. At this time you can consider using normal replication. \n\t\t\t\t 2. Some seemingly text content, in fact, as the picture is drawn, it can not grasp the text information, such as the hammer desktop, iReader, this time you can use the screenshot OCR function.
Long press the Share sidebar icon to adjust the order

The so-called word segmentation, is a word in accordance with the phrase split, the user can split the word free sort, combination, the rapid formation of new sentences. 
				 Because this application does not have the underlying operating system permissions, it can not be completely hammer mobile phone experience, but the application can monitor the click and copy the system to trigger the word segmentation, also provides global replication and screenshots OCR function, to cover large Part of the word situation. 
				 Word interface not only supports the operation of the hammer mobile phone, but also added a long press word split into words, drag the sort, retain the original structure of sub-features, the maximum extent possible to improve your election experience. 
				 The software settings may be more complex, read this page description will be of your help, thank you!
The Xposed version of a variety of trigger mode settings

XP version with the general version of the same, providing a single-click, double-click, long press, three kinds of trigger.
				 The trigger principle is when you click to click to the text, so some non-clickable area can also be triggered, such as the upper left corner of the QQ back. Some of the click area, if you click on the text, is also able to separate out these words.
				 But if the use of single-click trigger, there may be some false touch, of course, with the "click on the ball trigger" will be better, so in the end how to set, or see you use habits.
				 Known bugs：
				 1. In qq, if the trigger with a long press, with the default long press a little conflict, resulting in long press the menu display does not come out,
				 2. qq space can not be triggered,
				 3. Universal copy is still relying on ancillary services to do.
				 This is still not perfect, if you have feedback on the use of the problem.
				 PS: xposed trigger mode and the general version is not the same, each have advantages and disadvantages, we will try to optimize.
How to trigger a function with an external application

If you are still unsatisfied with these methods, or if you are using a third-party custom switch (such as a floating menu), you can send us a list of Function integrated into, as follows: 
 Package name: 
 		 * Normal: com.forfan.bigbang 
 		 * Xposed version: com.forfan.bigbang.coolapk 
 
 Class name: 
 		 * feature master switch (with copy and click): 		com.forfan.bigbang.component.activity.TotalSwitchActivity 
 
 		 * Global Replication: 		com.forfan.bigbang.component.activity.UniversalCopyActivity 
 
 		 * Area Screening OCR: 		com.forfan.bigbang.component.activity.screen.ScreenCaptureActivity 
 
 Tip: This page replicates package names and class names with global replication.
Check the application description and setup instructions?
If you have any problem,\n you can also view them in the "How to use" section of the "Other" settings
